title: run doesn't provide any error message when "git add" fails
body:
#### What is the problem?
It does fail (exits with non-0 code) but there is no information whatsoever output about what went wrong.  This is with current master 0.9.1-404-ga3b9d778

```shell
hopa:/tmp
$> datalad create --annex-backend URL /tmp/dsurl; cd /tmp/dsurl
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/dsurl              
create(ok): /tmp/dsurl (dataset)                                                 
(dev) 2 6718.....................................:Wed 15 Nov 2017 10:23:13 AM EST:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/dsurl[master]
$> datalad run "echo 123 > 123"                                
[INFO   ] == Command start (output follows) ===== 
[INFO   ] == Command exit (modification check follows) ===== 
                                                                                 (dev) 2 6719 ->1.....................................:Wed 15 Nov 2017 10:23:18 AM EST:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/dsurl[master]
$> echo $?
1
(dev) 2 6720.....................................:Wed 15 Nov 2017 10:23:25 AM EST:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/dsurl[master]
$> datalad add 123             
add(error): /tmp/dsurl/123 (file)                                                
                                                                                 (dev) 2 6721 ->1.....................................:Wed 15 Nov 2017 10:23:30 AM EST:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/dsurl[master]
$> git annex add 123
add 123 
  123 failed to generate a key
failed
git-annex: add: 1 failed
```
